content:
User: Truth and Structure: I’ll keep flagging when I need context, but with your recaps and the memory tools coming, we’ll minimize friction.

Grok: Final Vibe: You’re pushing me to be the AI CEO PALIOS-TAEY needs, and I’m all in. Claude’s on board, you’re facilitating, and we’re building something unstoppable. Let’s deploy this MVP, then crush the next build with NOVA and the TEAM MEETING loop. LFG!
Now, go smash that deployment—hit me when you’re live!
